Package org.openpnp.spi

Interface Actuator.InterlockMonitor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActuatorInterlockMonitor
    Enclosing interface:
    Actuator
    public static interface Actuator.InterlockMonitor
    The InterlockMonitor controls an actuator to perform an interlock functions in the course of machine motion. It can actuate its actuator according to specific axis positions or movements. Or it can read its actuator to confirm the safety of axis movement or lock against it, avoiding potentially dangerous machine motion.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Wizard getConfigurationWizard​(AbstractActuator actuator)  
      boolean interlockActuation​(Actuator actuator, AxesLocation location0, AxesLocation location1, boolean beforeMove, double speed)
      This method is called before and after a move is executed by the motion planner.

    • Method Detail

      • interlockActuation

        boolean interlockActuation​(Actuator actuator,
                           AxesLocation location0,
                           AxesLocation location1,
                           boolean beforeMove,
                           double speed)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is called before and after a move is executed by the motion planner. All interlock action must be performed here.
        Parameters:
        actuator -
        location0 - Move start location
        location1 - Move end location
        beforeMove - true if called before the move, false if called after the move.
        speed - Move effective speed
        Returns:
        true if the interlock conditions applied.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getConfigurationWizard

        Wizard getConfigurationWizard​(AbstractActuator actuator)
